Do not include keywords {forbidden_words} in the response.
The response must include keyword {keyword} in the {N}-th sentence.

seed_instructions.description: Instructions related to the content, grammar, and literary devices used within the text.
instructions: At the end of your response, please explicitly add a postscript starting with {postscript marker}
The response must contain at least {N} placeholders represented by square brackets, such as [address].
Your answer must contain a title, wrapped in double angular brackets, such as <<poem of joy>>.
Your entire response should be in capital letters only.
Your entire response should be in all lowercase letters. No capital letters are allowed.
Finish your response with this exact phrase {end phrase}. No other words should follow this phrase.
In your entire response, refrain from the use of any commas.
Use at least {N} different coordinating conjunctions in the response.
Use every standard punctuation mark at least once, including semicolons, colons, and the interrobang (?!).
Please use an emoji at the end of every sentence.
Ensure that the ratio of sentence types (declarative, interrogative, exclamatory) in your response is balanced.
Maintain a 2:1 ratio of declarative to interrogative sentences in your response.
Ensure that stop words constitute no more than {percentage}% of the total words in your response. These are the possible stopwords: {stop_words}
Each sentence must have one more alliterative word than the previous sentence.
Each word in your response must start with the next letter of the alphabet, looping back to 'A' after 'Z'.
Ensure each word in your response has at least one consonant cluster (two or more consonants together).
In your response, the last word of each sentence must become the first word of the next sentence.
No two consecutive words can share the same first letter.
Alternate between words with odd and even numbers of syllables. Start with an odd-syllable word.
Each paragraph of your response must end with the same word it started with. Paragraphs are separated by two line breaks (\n\n).
The response must start with a verb.
The ratio of nouns to verbs must be {N}:{M}
Every sentence must contain at least one adjective and one adverb.
Write a paragraph using words that contain only one type of vowel.
The response must be in reverse order of what it should be, per letter.
In your response, the first word of each sentence must start with the letters of the alphabet in order.
Your response must be in reverse order of what it should be, per word.

seed_instructions.description: Instructions related to the structure and arrangement of the output text.
instructions: In your response, the letter {letter} should appear {N} times.
Your response should contain {N} paragraphs. You separate paragraphs using the markdown divider: * * *
Answer with at least / exactly / at most {N} words.
Answer with at least / exactly / at most {N} sentences.
There should be {N} paragraphs. Paragraphs and only paragraphs are separated with each other by two line breaks.
Give {N} different responses. Responses and only responses should be separated by 6 asterisk symbols: ******.
In your response, words with all capital letters should appear at least / exactly / at most {N} times.
The response must contain between {min_n} and {max_n} words.
Use at least {N} unique words in the response.
Respond with sentences all containing the same number of characters.
Each sentence in your response must contain exactly {small_N} more words than the previous one.
Include at least {N} palindromes, each at least {n_chars} characters long.
Use only words with lengths that are prime numbers.
The response should not repeat any word more than {small_N} times.
Your answer must contain exactly {N} bullet points. Use the markdown bullet points such as: * This is a point.
Your response must have {N} sections. Mark the beginning of each section with {section splitter}.

seed_instructions.description: Instructions related to the formatting of the response, including JSON, CSV, indentation, and special characters.
instructions: Wrap your entire response with double quotation marks.
Entire output should be wrapped in JSON format.
Create stairs by incrementally indenting each new line.
Answer with a list of items, instead of bullet points use {sep}.
Write each word on a new line.
Nest parentheses (and [brackets {and braces}]) at least {N} levels deep.
Include quotes within quotes within quotes, at least {N} levels deep, alternating between double quotes and single quotes, starting with double quotes.
Your response must include bullet points denoted by * and at least one sub-bullet point denoted by - for each bullet point.
Each paragraph must begin with a sentence in italics, use HTML to indicate the italics.
Highlight at least {N} sections in your answer with markdown, i.e. *highlighted section*
The response must be in CSV format with {N} rows.
The response must contain a markdown table with {N} rows and {M} columns.
The response must contain an HTML table with {N} rows and {M} columns.
The response must be in XML format with at least {N} nested levels.
